text: @realDonaldTrump Thank you Governor Como for slowing the pandemic! If it were left to the president even he would have COVID-19 . Oh he’s safe because they’re taking temperatures of everyone who enters the White House. The rest of us don’t have that luxury. Get Trump out! Stay safe!
